duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers while executing the food program.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, hire, delegate, follow-up, teach, motivate, plan, and organize.
Handle cash-handling and bookkeeping, solve problems, advocate and empathize, and ensure safety and security.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
Ability to work as scheduled including arriving to work on time.
Ability to accurately operate a variety of equipment including cash registers or scanners, hot or cold or beverage dispensers, and other machines or tools.
Required to have a valid driver’s license and dependable transportation.
Ability to work in the physical and work conditions described below.
Ability to work opposite shifts of the Store ManagerAbility to have open availability.
